system.description: This spell functions like charm monster, except that mass charm monster affects a number of creatures whose combined HD do not exceed twice your caster level, or at least one creature regardless of HD. Targets must be no two more than 30 ft. apart. If more potential targets than you can affect, you choose until you pick one with too many HD.
system.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
